sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: NATO allies pledge more military aid for Ukraine as defence ministers meet for talks at Ramstein Air Base in Germany.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The foreign ministers of Germany and Spain say their priority is to achieve a ceasefire in Sudan, and the planes are standing by to evacuate their nationals.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The US is to start training Ukrainian forces on how to use and maintain Abrams tanks in

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: the coming weeks as it speeds up efforts to get them to the battlefield.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It was one of the points revealed during a defense minister's meeting on Ramstein Airbase in Germany on Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: We've also expedited our M1 Abrams timelines to supply Ukraine with more armored capability in the coming months.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And all of this is huge progress. And I am confident that this equipment and the training that accompanied it will put Ukraine's forces in a position to continue to succeed on the battlefield.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Supplying heavy weaponry such as tanks and artillery has sometimes been a contentious issue among Western nations. However, supporters say it will make a crucial difference to Ukraine's ability to fend off Russian aggression.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: U.S. General Mark A. Milley said Abrams' tanks are the best in the world and that they would be very effective on the battlefield.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: in the world and that they would be very effective on the battlefield. Romania and Poland are allowing Ukrainian food products to pass through their territory

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: until the European Commission decides on the matter.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Bucharest is calling on others to do the same after Kyiv promised to implement more security measures for the transport of farming products. για το κοινό. The European Commission is due to decide on the issue next week.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Fierce fighting in Khartoum continued for a seventh day on Friday between the Sudanese army and a rival paramilitary group, after efforts to reach a ceasefire for the Muslim holiday of Eid al-Fitr failed. nachdem die Anstrengungen, den Muslimen-Holiday zu verhindern, zu erreichen, zu verfehlen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Mehr als 400 Menschen wurden getötet und mehr als 1.000 verletzt, laut der Weltkommunikation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Die Außenministerien Deutschlands und Spanien haben gesagt, dass die Kampfkriege weiter die Anstrengungen zu la IJ, para que las personas puedan evacuarse.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Y con respecto a la evacuación de la colonia española y de otras nacionalidades que nos han pedido ayuda para poder ser evacuados, hemos dicho, por supuesto, que sí, lo tenemos todo listo. Hay unos aviones militares del ejército español.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: En la noche de la Navidad Mundial, la asociación meteorológica mundial de la UNED ha emitido un alarme. On the eve of World Earth Day, the UN's World Meteorological Association has issued an alarming

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: new report. It says in 2022, more than half the oceans experienced at least one marine heat wave and glaciers shrank. The average global temperature for the year was 1.15 degrees Celsius above pre-industrial levels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Today's policies would make our world 2.8 degrees hotter by the end of the century.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: And this is a death sentence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: We need global acceleration through cooperation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: And that means rising above disagreements, differences and tensions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Geopolitical divisions must not torpedo the world's climate fight for 1.5 degrees.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Developed countries have promised zero emissions by 2040, emerging economies by 2050.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Europe had its hottest summer ever in 2022. Droughts persist this year, with Copernicus data showing a quarter of the European continent and Mediterranean basin affected. And that's despite European investment in greener energy alternatives.
